Our Instructors

Sarah Hellowell

Sarah is the founder of checkmirrors.

She is an ADI with qualifications that include The Diamond Special Test, Pass Plus and Cardington Special Test. She has been a fully qualified instructor for over 15 years and takes pride in offering a professional, calm and safe environment that will help you pass your test.

Rob Kedge

Rob has 15 years experience as an ADI. He is a patient and friendly instructor able to adapt to teaching methods to suit each indivdual person. As well as an ADI Rob is a Pass Plus and Fleet trainer.

Ryan Fawcett

Ryan is a Business Management graduate who has spent 5 years in sales before deciding to become a qualified driving instructor in York. Ryan enjoys working with all ages and thrives on the challenge and success of helping people pass their tests.
